meta.title: Wordle - Play Wordle, the daily word game.
meta.description: Play Wordle, the daily word game.
meta.keywords: wordle, puzzle, word, play, game, online, guess

text.no_attempts: You haven't tried any words yet!

help.title: Help
help.text: Wordle is a word guessing game. You have six tries to guess correctly :)
help.text_2: Guess the daily WORDLE in 6 tries. Each guess must be a valid 5 letter word. After you submit your word, the color of the tiles will change to show you which letters are correct, somewhat correct or completely wrong.
